mapper.update:
update MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB
ORDER_ID=#{orderId},
SUBSCRIPTION_ID=#{subscriptionId},
START_TIME=#{startTime},
END_TIME=#{endTime},
PRICE=#{price},
DELETED=#{deleted},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime},
UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},
UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser},
DESCN=#{descn}
where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select ,od.DESCN ORDER_DESCN,od.STATUS from MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB orderSub left join MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER od on orderSub.ORDER_ID=od.ID where orderSub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID=#{subscriptionId}

select count(1) from MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB orderSub left join MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION sub on orderSub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID=sub.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_PRODUCT product on sub.PRODUCT_ID=product.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_BASE_REGION region on sub.BASE_REGION_ID=region.ID

select record.DESCN ORDER_DESCN, sub.ID INNER_SUBSCRIPTION_ID,sub.PRODUCT_ID,sub.START_TIME SUB_START_TIME,sub.END_TIME SUB_END_TIME,DATEDIFF(sub.END_TIME, NOW()) AS DATE_NUM, product.NAME PRODUCT_NAME, region.NAME BASE_REGION_NAME from MATRIX_BILLING_ORDER_SUB orderSub left join MATRIX_BILLING_SUBSCRIPTION sub on orderSub.SUBSCRIPTION_ID=sub.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_PRODUCT product on sub.PRODUCT_ID=product.ID left join MATRIX_BILLING_BASE_REGION region on sub.BASE_REGION_ID=region.ID left join MATRIX_PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD record on sub.PRODUCT_INFO_RECORD_ID=record.ID
and sub.USER_ID = #{userId}
